org.newdawn.slick.tools.hiero.truetype
Class FontData

java.lang.Object
  org.newdawn.slick.tools.hiero.truetype.FontData

public class FontData
extends java.lang.Object

A wrapper that brings Java font and TTF read fonts together.

Author:
kevin
